text: Interested in my research? Come work with me and my collegues at the Roux Institute. I'm actively looking for Summer Interns and Postdoctoral Researchers.
I'm on the job market this year, seeking research scientist and TT faculty positions. Please feel free to reach out to me with opportunities.
I successfully defended my thesis proposal and advanced to degree candidacy (ABD).
I'll be joining Microsoft Research FATE team for a research internship in Summer 2021. I will be mentored by Hal Daum√© III to work on debiasing XAI systems and AI fairness.
Co-organizing TREX: Workshop on Trust and Expertise in Visualization at IEEE VIS'21 for the second time. Follow us on Twitter @TrexInVis for the latest updates!
üèÜ Our full paper at ACM IUI'21 received a best paper, honorable mention award.
üèÜ I received special recognition for an outstanding review from CHI 2021.
üèÜ I am honored to have received the Gartner Group Graduate Fellowship from University of Florida, College of Engineering!
Our paper "Anchoring Bias Affects Mental Models and User Reliance in Explainable AI Systems" was accepted to ACM IUI 2021 Conference as a full paper.
üèÜ I am happy to announce that I was a recepient of the Outstanding Achievement Awards 2020 from the University of Florida, College of Engineering.
I am organizing the TRust and EXpertise in Visual Analytics (TREX) Workshop at IEEE VIS 2020.
I got three full papers accepted to AAAI HCOMP 2020.
I co-organized University of Florida affiliated Virtual CHI Presentation Day.
Our XAI work got published as a CHI 2020 Late-Breaking Work.
Our SplitStreams paper got accepted to IEEE Transactions of Visualization and Computer Graphics.
